description.value:
This fortified three-story tower floats atop a semisolid thundercloud.

Wondrous Item: Rare

Properties:

  • The tower is a flying vehicle (see Dungeon Magazine 200 for statistics) with a magical control circle inscribed on the roof.
  • Up to six humanoids can be attuned to the control circle.
  • The control circle can also be used as a teleportation circle.

Power ✦ At-Will (Move Action)

Requirement: You must be attuned to the tower and in the control circle.

Effect: You pilot the tower.

Power ✦ Encounter (Standard Action)

Requirement: You must be attuned to the tower and in the control circle.

Attack: Ranged 20 (one, two, or three creatures); +28 vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d10 + 8 lightning and thunder damage.
